description: Multiple advanced fabrics combine to deliver Kuhl's most technically advanced men's hiking pants. The Klash Pant delivers superior durability without sacrificing comfort. Equipped with water-resistance and freedom enhancing stretch, these year-round, softshell, pants are loaded with features to take you anyplace you need to go without the weather slowing you down.
name: Kuhl Klash Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens
